name: SFSafariToolbarItem
desc: A proxy for a Safari app extension toolbar item in a Safari window.

items.name: func setBadgeText(String?)
items.desc: Sets the badge text for the toolbar item.

items.name: func setEnabled(Bool)
items.desc: Sets whether the toolbar item is enabled.

items.name: func setImage(NSImage?)
items.desc: Sets the image displayed in the toolbar button.
